author: Brian Turner
method: Heat the butter in a frying pan, add the orange slices and fry for two minutes. Add the honey and fry for a further minute on each side. Remove the oranges from the pan and place on a serving plate. Add the orange juice to the frying pan, along with the double cream. Simmer for 2-3 minutes, or until slightly thickened. Pour the sauce over the oranges and serve garnished with mint leaves.
ingredients: 25g/1oz unsalted butter,  1 orange, peeled, sliced,  2 tbsp honey,  ½ orange, juice only,  100ml/3½fl oz double cream,  fresh mint leaves, to garnish
